svg.text: Intelligent Review Business Value and Performance Analytics

g.text: • Expand to additional teams (3x ROI multiplier)
• Improved product quality reducing customer support costs

svg.title: Review ROI Analytics Dashboard - Intelligent Review Business Value and Performance Analytics
svg.desc: Comprehensive analytics dashboard showing ROI calculation, performance trends, business impact analysis, and optimization recommendations for intelligent review implementation with 340% ROI and strategic business benefits.
